title: Preparation and characterization of hierarchically porous hybrid gels for efficient dye adsorption
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29384-29394
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05844E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yong-Kang Xia, Xiang-Jun Zha, Yu-Xiang She, Ting-Xian Ling, Jing Xiong, Kun-Lan Huang, Ji-Gang Huang
The HPHG features a multi-level porous structure (from 48 ± 28 nm to 4385 ± 823 nm) that significantly enhances its porosity and specific surface area.
